title: My Dress-Up Maki-chan
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Morning. Did I make you wait?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>No, not at a-.... Aaah! That dress! That’s the one Ruby picked, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah, it is.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Wow.... Waaah~. It really does look good on you. Ehehe, you look so cute~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I bought it because you said it did.... So, of course.... it would suit me....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Putting that aside, Ruby is really happy that you decided to wear it for our trip today. You’re really thoughtful, aren’t you, Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>No, this was just.... a coincidence....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hey, Maki-chan.... Ruby wants to find a bag that suits that dress of yours today! ....Can we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eeeh!? Weren’t we going to look at some clothes for you-....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>....Pleaseee♡<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
